# FindForce

> Professional email verification Chrome extension with 95% accuracy guarantee

FindForce helps sales teams find and verify business emails in seconds. One-click verification on LinkedIn and other professional networks. Flat rate pricing with unlimited verifications.

## Quick Facts

- Product: Chrome Extension for Email Verification
- Accuracy: 95% guaranteed (or money back)
- Pricing: €0/mo (25 free) | €49/mo (unlimited)
- Target Users: SDRs, Sales Teams, Recruiters, Email Marketers
- Platform: Chrome Web Store
- Company: Developer Friendly OÜ (Estonia, EU)
- GDPR: Fully compliant, EU-hosted (Frankfurt)

## Core Features

- Multi-layer email verification (syntax, DNS/MX, SMTP, pattern matching)
- One-click verification on LinkedIn profiles
- Confidence scores (85-99%) for each email
- CSV export and copy-to-clipboard
- No credit systems or usage limits on Pro plan
